p: The clinical characteristics of patients with imported COVID-19 were reviewed using descriptive clinical epidemiological methods including clinical symptoms, exposure history, chest computed tomography (CT) imaging findings, and type of oxygen support required Anti-COVID-19 antibody, hematologic test, clinical chemistry test, coagulation test, and immune and inflammatory indices were obtained from the medical record system and the sampling time was no more than 24â€…h after admission.
